settings.title: How it works
settings.code:
Instant Access

✓ Gain instant access to your course(s) upon purchasing through our website

✓ Login credentials are sent immediately to the customer to the email address provided during the checkout process

✓ We also advise all customers to check their spam and junk mail folders in case your mail server has diverted the email there

Learn Anytime, Anywhere, On Any Device

✓ Learn at your own pace, at a time and place convenient to your circumstances

✓ Individual learners can access their course material(s) 24/7 for 365 days from the date of purchase

✓ In the case of organisations that order multiple licences for future use, the countdown will start when learners are allocated to the training course(s)

Assessment and Certification

✓ Unlimited attempts to complete end of course assessments

✓ On successful completion, download, print/save quality-assured CPD certificate

Online Support 24/7

✓ Customer service teams interact with clients through email and live chat support

100% Money-Back Guarantee

✓ We want you to be completely satisfied with your training. We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if you are not 100% satisfied

Refund policy

✓ To request a refund, you should email our support team with your receipt stating why you would like to be reimbursed

✓ You, or your learners, must not complete the training to make a valid refund claim. Any courses that have been completed and those with certificates achieved will not be valid for a refund

The Mandatory Training Group - CPDUK Accredited E-Learning Providers.

settings.title: Certification
settings.code:
End of course assessment

At the end of this course, learners are required to complete an online end of course assessment. On successful completion of the assessment (80% pass mark), learners may download a FREE CPD certificate from their profile page.

Certification

On successful completion of this e-learning course and end of course assessment, the learner may download, save and/or print a quality assured CPD certificate (recognised internationally). Our CPD certificate can be used to provide evidence for compliance and audit or Continuing Professional Development (CPD).

Course accreditation

The CPD Certification Service accredits all our online training courses and programmes as conforming to universally accepted Continuous Professional Development (CPD) guidelines.rses meet the latest guidance and best practice recommendations.

The Mandatory Training Group - CPDUK Accredited E-Learning Providers.

settings.title: Why choose us
settings.code:
Why choose our accredited e-learning courses and programmes?

The benefits of using our accredited e-learning courses in the workplace include:

✓   CPDUK accredited e-learning provider
✓   Ofqual approved training centre (UK qualifications)
✓   Internationally recognised CPD and Ofqual approved certificates
✓   Wide range of courses and qualifications that meet UK legislation and guidelines
✓   Over 500 online courses and programmes that cover multiple sectors
✓   Free blended learning environment for individuals and organisations
✓   Immediate access to online courses and programmes
✓   Highly interactive e-learning portal
✓   Substantial cost reductions (no travel fees and other expenses)
✓   Self-paced online learning
✓   Low carbon footprint through e-learning
✓   Repository of online learning materials and assessments
✓   Fully qualified and experienced trainers, instructors and assessors
✓   Experienced subject matter experts and content developers
✓   Conversion of existing classroom courses to e-learning courses
✓   All training courses meet the latest guidance and best practice recommendations.

The Mandatory Training Group - CPDUK Accredited E-Learning Providers.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.code:
Frequently Asked Questions

To enrol on this e-learning course, please add the course to your basket. From there, you will be redirected to our secure checkout page to complete your booking.

If you are booking the course for someone else, please click the ‘Buy For Others’ button at the upper right hand of this page.

Once your payment has been confirmed, you will receive a booking confirmation email with a receipt. Immediately after purchase, you will receive an email with further instructions and unique login credentials to access your learner account. Next, you will need to follow the instructions and login to your learner account.

Our courses are divided into six units. You can either read or listen to the course materials. At the end of each unit is a ‘knowledge check’ section. This section helps the learners remember what they have learnt.

Our online training courses can be completed on your desktop computer/Mac, laptop, tablet or mobile device. These online courses are easily accessible as long as there is an internet connection.

These online training courses are self-paced. Therefore, learners have full control and flexibility on when they wish to complete the material.

There is no deadline for completion. The course will expire from a learner’s account after 365 days, whether it has been accessed or not.

Yes. All end of course assessments are completed online.

Learners are required to achieve a passing rate of 80% or more to complete the course and gain a CPD certificate.

To obtain your certificate, you need to complete the end of course assessment first. A passing rate of 80% or more is required to gain a CPD certificate.

Obtained certificates can be downloaded from the learner’s profile page.

We want you to be completely satisfied with your training. Thus, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if you are not 100% satisfied.To request a refund, you should email our Support Team with your receipt stating why you would like to be refunded. Any courses that have been completed and those with certificates will not be valid for a refund.

Yes, you can access the learning materials from any electronic device that has an internet connection. However, we recommend that you use a desktop or laptop device for the best learning experience. These online courses can also be taken on tablets and mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhone and Android mobile phones.

For the best possible experience, we recommend that learners use Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Internet Explorer 11 or Firefox. Please ensure no updates are pending on your browser.

There is no estimated completion time for this course. Learners can study in their own time at their speed. Learners may pause, leave and come back to the system to continue the training at any time.

The CPD hours depend on how long each learner takes to complete the course materials and assessments. Each course will indicate the anticipated completion time. This gives a general indication of the CPD hours for those who are required to submit their continuing professional development hours.

The Mandatory Training Group - CPDUK Accredited E-Learning Providers.

settings.item_title: Online Training Courses & Qualifications - UK Accredited E-Learning
settings.item_text: Browse Accredited Online Training Courses & Qualifications - Improve Your Career Prospects.
Learn anytime, anywhere on any device. Choose from over 500 CPDUK accredited e-learning courses and approved qualifications.
Learn new skills in various subjects to improve your personal productivity, career development and employability opportunities.
Meet the UK and international legislative and regulatory requirements , industry standards and best practice recommendations.
View all courses

settings.item_title: Statutory and Mandatory Training News and Guidance
settings.item_text: Browse our recommended blog posts to find out the latest legislative and regulatory updates.

The Mandatory Training Group is the leading UK provider of accredited statutory and mandatory training courses for all sectors, including health and social care, education, local government, private companies, charitable and third sector organisations.

Our content development and instructional design teams have extensive workforce development experience across various sectors. Our belief is that by making things simple, and designing interactive e-learning content, we can truly provide meaningful learning experiences from novice to expert programs.

Read more

settings.item_title: Workforce Development, Education & Training Solutions
settings.item_text: Are you looking to generate eLearning solutions that meet your specific organisational requirements? Are you looking to develop and implement high-impact training programmes across all levels of the organisation? Then look no further than our cost-effective tenant systems, bespoke and custom-developed e-learning solutions. Our experienced team of subject matter experts, project managers, and software developers have vast experience in public, private, and third sector training development. Our highly experienced workforce development team provides support with training needs assessments; bespoke content development; education and training implementation, assessments, examinations; accreditation and certification, and measuring training effectiveness.

settings.item_title: Online Train the Trainer Courses & Qualifications
settings.item_text: Are you looking for train the trainer courses to support organisations and employees? Are you an independent trainer looking to develop new skills and subject knowledge? The Mandatory Training Group provides a wide range of train the trainer courses, Ofqual-approved trainer qualifications, trainer packs, and teaching materials for trainers across all sectors. We fully understand that learners have different learning styles and training needs differ between organisations. Thus, our experienced workforce development team will give you access to our free blended learning solutions and will work with you to develop suitable learning materials and teaching resources for trainers and facilitators.

settings.text_content: The expertise and experience The Mandatory Training Group brought to the table was priceless; my staff now have access to a variety of relevant online CPD courses, I personally have direct access to online reports, assessment results/charts, can download any of my staff’s certificates at the click of a button and can block my staff from downloading their own certificates, which is a real bonus on protecting the business and the admin side of training and compliance. Great system and so glad we got in touch.

The Mandatory Training Group have been inspirational on supporting our home in Oldham, UK. We were really struggling with training and workforce development and needed a complete overhaul. The approach was very refreshing and we are in a much better position now and are looking forward to a long term relationship with The Mandatory Training Group.
The trainer from The Mandatory Training Group was excellent and the content delivered was very beneficial to how we adapted our daily systems moving forward following the training.
Both trainers were friendly, approachable, reliable and informative. Engaged well with the learners and adapted sessions to suit the needs of the service.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.code:
Frequently Asked Questions

To enrol/book the course, please add the course/s to your basket and proceed to the Checkout Page to complete your booking.

If ordering on behalf of another individual/s, please specify their full details, i.e. full name/s and email address/es, in the Special Instructions for Seller section of the Shopping Basket/Cart so that our system will assign the course/s accordingly.

Organisations/companies looking to enrol multiple candidates to our online courses will get a relative discount per order according to the number of users to be enrolled.
Please contact our Customer Service team with the information below (where applicable) for a discounted invoice creation:

  • Primary contact name/s (To whom the invoice will be sent)
  • Primary contact number/s
  • Primary contact's email address
  • Business name
  • Business address
  • Name(s) of Course(s)
  • Number of credits/licenses/users required
  • Website (if any).

Our system automatically sends an email with login details and instructions (to the email you provided when you bought the course/s) within 2-5 minutes after purchase.
Some email servers (e.g., Google and Yahoo) may automatically divert emails to the Junk/Spam mail folders, so you must also check them.
NB: Ensure that you follow the instructions appropriately to avoid access errors. Copy and paste the default Username and Password rather than typing them.

If you face any challenges logging in, cannot remember your old password, or just want to reset your password, please click the 'Forgot your password?' link on the login page, then follow the instructions that pop up to reset your password.
NB: Ensure that you use the email address used for enrolment.

Yes, all our online training courses and programmes are externally peer-reviewed and accredited by the CPD Certification Service (CPDUK), and some are also Ofqual-approved. The CPDUK certification is recognised around the world.

Yes. All our online training courses and programmes are internationally recognised and verifiable for CPD hours completed.
You only need an internet connection on a desktop computer, laptop, tablet, iPad, or smartphone to complete the training from anywhere, anytime.

All our CPD courses are done online via our Learner Management System (LMS). You only need an internet connection on a desktop computer, laptop, tablet, iPad, or smartphone to complete the training. You can start, pause/stop and return to where you left off.

Indicative course duration varies depending on the course level, ranging from 30 minutes for awareness courses to 6 hours for some CPD programmes. Each course overview section will specify the indicative course duration.
See the course duration guide below:

  • Level 1 (Awareness) - 30-60 minutes
  • Level 2 (Intermediate) - 60-90 minutes
  • Level 3 and above (Advanced) - 90-240 minutes.

NB: Some specialist continuing professional development (CPD) programmes or packages combine various modules, for example, Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3, or the Mandatory Training for Nurses package could have 15 modules. Duration may also depend on the learner's prior knowledge of the subject matter.

After completing each online module or training programme and achieving the required pass mark in the end-of-course assessment, you will be able to download a CPD certificate (PDF).
Some courses may have a completion certificate without an end-of-course assessment; this will be specified in the course overview section.

Where applicable, the course CPD points/hours are specified in each course's overview section.
Course points/hours will vary depending on the prior knowledge of the subject, experience required, course level, assessment(s), and or according to accrediting body specifications.

We offer FREE courses as part of our various promotions/campaigns on topical issues. However, learners will have to pay a small fee if they want to download a CPD certificate at the end because it covers costs for:

  • Course accreditation (for the CPD certification) Server space to download and store the certificate.
  • We are required by law to store certificates as part of auditing and quality assurance purposes.

Where applicable, the certificate expiry recommended for every course is specified in the overview section. However, some industries/sectors/organisations determine how often training must be undertaken and the validity period of the certificates.
For example, the Safeguarding Adults Level 3 course has to be refreshed every three years, and some organisations may require their employees to refresh every year while some course certificates do not have an official expiry.

Our CPD training courses are not qualifications but can be used as refresher mandatory and statutory training for already qualified persons to count towards their continuing professional development hours.
Some courses can be used as an introduction and induction training for non-qualified individuals, which entirely depends on the employer's requirements.

The Mandatory Training Group - CPDUK Accredited E-Learning Providers.
